name: Verbullets
description:
Shoulder shooter where you type to do everything-- we 'removed' conventional movement and camera/shooting controls! 

To play a LAN match, one player can type 'host', allowing others to 'join' their session. When all players (max 4) are in, type 'start' to begin! 

Controls (some words have wiggle room variants!):

* forward/left/right/backward to navigate

* turn left/turn right to rotate

* fire/shoot to fire
